name: Asteroids (itch) (Jaroslavovich)
description:
My fiest game on C++ with SFML library. In this game you fly on spaceship and you should avoid asteroids to survive, also you can shoot asteroids. Here are only *.cpp and *.hpp files and screenshots of game, SFML library is too big to be uploaded here.
link to library and solution on google-drive: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1mLAX6v7pjJgHqvru422rmdgNNav_0Jqk
